params.name: text
params.description: If `html` is set, this is not required. Text to use within the breadcrumbs item. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: If `text` is set, this is not required. HTML to use within the breadcrumbs item. If `html` is provided, the `text` option will be ignored.

params.name: href
params.description: Link for the breadcrumbs item. If not specified, breadcrumbs item is a normal list item.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the individual crumb.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the breadcrumbs container.

name: collapseOnMobile
description: When true, the breadcrumbs will collapse to the first and last item only on tablet breakpoint and below.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the breadcrumbs container.
